career_path.summary: This text outlines potential career paths following a course, including roles such as GIS Officer, Conservation and Recycling Officer, Logistics and Distribution Manager, and Researcher. It also encourages individuals to pursue careers in humanities and social sciences.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Geographical information systems (GIS) officer
• Conservation and Recycling officer
• Logistics and distribution manager
• Researcher in various organizations/Research Institutes
Take the next step towards a career in humanities & social sciences.
